Package model.server

Class Lobby

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.server.Lobby
  • public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Lobby for the Collecto Networked Game.
    Author:
    Daniel Botnarenco

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void enter​(GameClientHandler client)
      Adds a player to the lobby.
      java.util.List<GameClientHandler> getClients()
      Returns a list of clients that are in the lobby, represented as GameClientHandlers.

      Returns the game that is being played on the lobby.

      Returns the name of the lobby/game.

      Returns how many players can connect to this lobby.

      • currentPlayers

        public int currentPlayers

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lobby

        public Lobby​(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new lobby. Initializes the ArrayList of clients. Sets started to false and currentPlayers to 0.
        Parameters:
        name - indicating the name of the lobby

    • Method Detail

      • enter

        public void enter​(GameClientHandler client)
        Adds a player to the lobby.
        Parameters:
        client - the player to be added

      • leave

        public void leave​(GameClientHandler client)
        Response when a client wants to leave a game. He is removed from the lobby and the game is stopped if it was started.
        Parameters:
        client - that has left the game

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if the lobby does not have any player.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the lobby/game.

      • getNrPlayers

        public int getNrPlayers()
        Returns how many players can connect to this lobby.

      • getGame

        public NetworkedGame getGame()
        Returns the game that is being played on the lobby.

      • getClients

        public java.util.List<GameClientHandler> getClients()
        Returns a list of clients that are in the lobby, represented as GameClientHandlers.

      • sendToAllClients

        public void sendToAllClients​(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message to all the clients in the lobby.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be sent

        public Lobby getLobby()
